titles.title: Beach Villa Pratumnak

descriptions.description: This is a 3 storey direct beachfront luxury home which gives full access onto Pratumnak beach, and stunning views of the sea from all 3 floors of the building. Designed to a modern taste it offers a private swimming pool and private parking at the front of the property. As you step inside there is a large Western kitchen, and an open plan living space with a dramatic 2 floor cathedral ceiling atrium. On the 2nd floor there are two full en-suite bedrooms each with built in furniture and air conditioning. The beach-side room has a beach balcony and the rear room has an additional living room of its own! Rising up to the top 3rd floor is an amazing Penthouse which has been converted from 2 full bedrooms to be used presently as a master bedroom and sea-view office! This is a totally unique opportunity to have an extremely rare beachfront house in the whole of Pattaya! The neighbouring is very quiet and exclusive however the city centre is just minutes away. The neighborhood itself features a royal residence, luxury condos and villas and the five-star Centara Grand Hotel is across the street on the inland side of the property. Also the paved footpaths along the beach are all being upgraded now and the water is just metres away. The home is priced to be sold essentially unfurnished, and the property is currently owned in Thai company name. The owner will consider a partially furnished sale if desired. Viewings are by 24 hour appointment only. Send us an Email or contact the office for more details, or to arrange a viewing Tel: +6638411250 Email: info@old.cornerstone.co.th

titles.title: Temple Court

descriptions.description: This brand new house in the Charknok lake area of Pattaya boasts an impressive 300 sqm of living area over its 2 stories, and the property sits on a grand 125 sqw (500 sqm) land plot. The roomy home has been finished to a high modern European standards and it will comes fully furnished just like a "show home". This will mean that you can even choose your own furniture package, so that you get the property finished and styled exactly to your liking. Already installed are brand new Daikin air conditioners throughout the house, a fully functional wrap around western kitchen with breakfast bar/island. The front garden has a private swimming pool and poolside bathroom, and there is a staircase which leads to the upper full width terrace. Located in a small cluster of houses that are being built now. The village will be secured behind electronic gates, but there will be no monthly or yearly charges for the village. The property is currently owned in Thai Name, and can be easily transferred into a Thai or Company name. Please contact us on 038 411250 or email info@cornerstone.co.th for further details on this unique opportunity.

titles.title: Foxlea Villa

descriptions.description: This large property offers a villa, guest cottage all in the same grounds. The estate has a 4 bedroom villa, a 2 bedroom guest cottage, stunning private swimming pool, Jacuzzi and waterfall, all set within a lush landscaped tropical garden. It is a bargain, awaiting to be captured now! The estate is situated only 12 kms (15 Minutes) from North Pattaya, with a direct motorway link into town. The motorway is only 2 kms from the Villa. In the immediate area are 5 International schools, 12 World Class Golf Courses, lots of family activities, beaches, lakes and tourist attractions. Main Property - A luxurious 4 Bedroom Villa, with large 8m x 5m private swimming pool, waterfall and Jacuzzi. The Sala Bar has a snooker/pool table and table football and behind is a BBQ area so that you can entertain your friends in style. The 400 sq.m Villa is set in large, tropical planted grounds of 350 sq.wah (1,400 sqm) of coconut plantation. Living here offers total privacy, no neighbours, and not overlooked by anyone. Surrounded by a tall 8'' perimeter wall that is well illuminated with automatic lighting, also the pool and waterfall are lit by LED as well. The Villa has 4 large bedrooms which all having en-suite bathroom facilities. They all have air-conditioning and overhead fans, T.V. & DVD Players. The open plan lounge a fantastic Western kitchen at one end, which offers lots of storage and a central preparation island. All appliances are built in: an oven, gas hob, fridge freezer, microwave oven and drinking water machine. From the sofa you can also sit and enjoy the views of the gardens. Adjoining the living room is a wide covered terrace, with a winding (covered) pathway to the sala bar. Enjoy the outside sitting area for watching TV, eating, or drinking a cool beer. A new pool table has recently been added for entertainment and there is also a new music centre with surround sound speaker system to enjoy your music, or sing-along to Karaoke. The Villa has 50mps WiFi internet, an alarm system, safety deposit box, and smoke alarms. The car parking area is covered and has space for 4 cars. and has electric gates. Detached Guest Cottage - The cottage is completely isolated from the main villa which can be accessed directly from a separate rear entrance! There is also a large wall with private locked gate between the main villa and this small guest house. There is a lounge area with an attached bedroom to the side, a 2nd bedroom, and a bathroom. Between the rooms is an open kitchen, with all necessary cooking utensils, 3 store rooms and a tool room with attic storage. Call Cornerstone Real Estate on +6638411250 or Email info@cornerstone.co.th for further details, or to make an appointment,

titles.title: D Sign Homes

descriptions.description: D-Sign Homes is a brand new village of 15 luxury homes. The village is being developed in Huay Yai which is rapidly becoming a “hot spot” for Ex Pat families with children needing the higher end International schools, or easy access to the industrial hubs and shipping ports that form the Eastern Seaboard. In total there will be 15 bespoke modern contemporary villas. Each will be a 2 storey design with 3 or 4 bedrooms. The promotional price is for the entry villa that sits on a 60 sq.wah (240 sq.metres) land plot, and has a 190 sq.metre living area. The 2 storey floor plan is for a 3 Bedroom, 3 ½ Bathroom layout The price includes the construction of the house on the land, bathrooms completed, and 4 air conditioning units (cassette type in the living room). After this, the developer offers a choice of optional extras should the buyer wish: 550,000 Baht = Swimming Pool 400,000 Baht = Western Kitchen: washing machine, fridge, microwave, hob, oven and extractor 400,000 Baht = Built in furniture: wardrobes/drawers, TV units, dressing areas 475,000 Baht = Furniture Pack: beds/mattresses, bedside tables, lamps, curtains, sofa, coffee table, mirrors, wall decorations, dining table/chairs, outdoor furniture & 3 x tv's Payment plans are flexible. The base payment plan is as follows: 100,000 Baht - Reservation 500,000 Baht - Upon signing contract (within 14 days) Payments over 10 months (maximum) 40% upon completion Build time 6 months

titles.title: Sefton Park

descriptions.description: Sefton Park is a small gated community in Pong, East Pattaya. This location is on the Eastern side of the Mabprachan reservoir and very close to the International schools, Siam Country Club Golf Courses and the Motorways & Highways that facilitate the Eastern seaboard. Lots of Ex Pat families chose this location as it is very family friendly. There is a real community spirit as many families know each other as their children visit the same schools, or the same after school activities. There is a local market which sells all the daily fresh food, fruit and vegetables, plus there is a Tesco Express and 7/11 on the main road too. This 3 bedroom house is a modern style home that is available fully furnished. The home has an L-Shaped Western kitchen with built in oven and comes with a washing machine as well. Overall this is a very pleasant village with natural shrubs separating the homes. Send us an Email or contact the office for more details, or to arrange a viewing. Tel: +6638411250 Email: info@cornerstone.co.th

titles.title: 8 Rai Land Plot in Huay Yai

descriptions.description: Huay Yai. This large 8 Rai (12,800 sq.m) of development land is located directly beside one of the new Motorway flyovers that joins Bangkok with the Southern beaches in Jomtien. It is large enough to be transformed into a new housing estate of between 8 - 16 homes or for a commercial premises with excellent road frontage. The 8 Rai plot had been cut over 10 years ago in to eight 1 Rai (1,600 sq.m) plots and a further title deed for internal road access to each. The plot has good drainage and immediate connections to the city power & water supplies. Owned in a Company name this makes the purchase much easier for any developer as it can be used as the operating Thai Company. The total price is based on a Per Rai price of 3.9m Baht (8 x 3.9m = 31.2m Baht) Call Cornerstone Real Estate on +6638411250 or Email info@cornerstone.co.th for further details or to make an appointment

titles.title: 1 Rai (1,608sq.m) Land Plot on Phoenix Gold Golf Course

descriptions.description: Phoenix Gold Golf Course is one of Pattaya's leading courses and is within 25 minutes of the city. The 27 hole course comprises of three 9 holes courses (Ocean, Mountain & Lakes) with each offering differing views of the countryside of coastline. Phoenix Gold Golf Course has been popular with Pattaya Expats for many years, and is now under new management with new investment going into the whole site. Now the course is recognised on the Asian Tours with championships being held throughout the year. This 1 Rai land plot is on a sloping site that from the highest point will allow views over all of a Par 3 golf hole (from tee to green), plus sights of a further green from the preceding hole. All co-owners have access to the club house and its onsite restaurant, plus full use of the communal swimming pool and tennis court. There are security guards on the front entrance who patrol the course all day & night. The title deed is held in Company name so taking over will be minimal costs. Send us an Email or contact the office for more details, or to arrange a viewing Tel: +6638411250 Email: info@cornerstone.co.th

titles.title: Sansuk Town 2

descriptions.description: Sansuk Town 2. This is a modern townhouse estate in East Pattaya that was completed in 2018. The properties are 2 storey with a alrge open plan ground floor living area and a 2 bedroom layout upstairs. There is a good sized front area to the house which can be used for off roads parking, however this owner has tiled the space so it is also a nice space to sit outside. Downstairs is a clean and bright living area that extends all the way to the back of the home where there is a small guest toilet, a fitted kitchen and a rear outdoor space that has been covered and a washing machine installed. Upstairs both bedrooms have use of the large bathroom. The master bedroom boasts lots of fitted furniture and a small balcony. The smaller rear bedroom is also a good size with nice furnishings. The home is great value for money for a long term tenant, and it comes fully furnished. Call Cornerstone Real Estate on +6638411250 or Email info@cornerstone.co.th to make an appointment to view the property

titles.title: Club Royal

descriptions.description: Club Royal Wongamat. This low-rise resort style condominium offers great communal facilities and it’s just 50 metres from a nice quiet and private beach. At the centre of the complex is a huge swimming pool and some nice water features. There is plenty of sunbathing areas around the pool, plus there is a rooftop terrace, from where there are views of both the sea and the Sanctuary of Truth temple. Also onsite is a full fitness centre, a convenient minimart, secure underground car parking and 24 hour security. This 2 bedroom property boasts the best position in the whole project. Located on the top floor (8th) with views of the sea, and down over the pool area below. With 73 sq.m of living space this is a great family apartment. There is a Western fitted kitchen and a bright living room with the sea view balcony beyond. The 2 bedrooms are generous sizes, and the master bedroom has an en-suite bathroom. Both have floor to ceiling wardrobes and full view windows. Owned in Foreign (freehold) name this also makes the property highly valuable. All the taxes and transfer fees shall be split on a 50/50 basis with the buyer. Call Cornerstone Real Estate on +6638411250 or Email info@cornerstone.co.th for further details, or to make an appointment

titles.title: Paragon Park

descriptions.description: Paragon Park. This village is in Huay Yai and features lovely mature landscaped streets, underground electricity and a small handful of private villas on large land plots. This 3 bedroom villa has a huge open plan living room and Western kitchen as you enter the home giving the feeling of space. It is possible to see the pool & gardens beyond. Each of the bedrooms has its own private en-suite bathroom, the master bedroom has a space which can be re-designed for walk through wardrobes, plus there is a guest bathroom which has been altered to include a washing machine. 2 of the bedrooms can walk straight out into the garden & pool area. This outdoor space is at the rear of the property so it is very nice and private. There is a covered area close to the pool so you can choose to be in, or out of the sun. The sale of the property shall include all of the high quality furniture. Huay Yai is a family area of East Pattaya, which is less than 20 minutes from the city centre and beaches. Owned in Company Name the costs to transfer are very low. Contact Cornerstone Real Estate: Email: info@cornerstone.co.th or call +6638411250 for further details.

descriptions.description: Supalai Mare Condominium Jomtien. This property is located within a huge high-rise development on Thepprasit road, in Jomtien. This main road runs directly from Sukhumvit Road into Jomtien, and the long stretch of beach is just 1km away. This 28th floor unit offers some amazing views over Jomtien and Pattaya City. It is a 32 sq.m sea view studio unit that is fully furnished and includes a built-in European style kitchen and all appliances. Supalai Mare Condo Facilities include: A massive infinity swimming pool, an equipped gymnasium & sauna, a high floor sky lounge and library, plus 24hr security and CCTV. The condo is available with a long term rental contract and a 2 month security deposit. It is also available for Sale in Company Name and a 50/50 split on all legal fees. titles.title: Supalai Mare

descriptions.description: Supalai Mare Condominium Jomtien. Built and complete in 2017 this high rise condominium is located close to Jomtien beach, along Thepprasit Road. This 34th floor two bedroom condo has some simply breath-taking views of Jomtien Beach, Pattaya City and out across the Gulf Of Thailand. Its even possible to see the Koh Larn island. In total the property is 72.58 sq.m in size and this includes a spacious living room, a master bedroom with en-suite bathroom, a 2nd bedroom and separate guest bathroom, plus a fitted European kitchen and built in appliances. Supalai Mare Condo has lots of communal facilities which include: A massive infinity swimming pool, a poolside gymnasium & sauna, a high floor sky lounge and library, plus 24hr security and CCTV. The building is very convenient to get to the Tesco Lotus or Big C Super Center’s on Sukhumvit Road, a whole array of dining experiences from local Thai to International and fine dining, the Bangkok airport coach and many styles of bar, and pub along Jomtien beach road or the smaller streets. Jomtien beach is just 1km away, and Pattaya City is just a short motorcycle, or taxi ride away The condo is available, only with a long term rental contract and a 2 month security deposit. Send us an Email or contact the office for more details, or to arrange a viewing Tel: +6638411250 or Email: info@cornerstone.co.th

titles.title: Phoenix Luxury Retreat

descriptions.description: Phoenix Luxury Retreat. This is a totally unique property located on a one rai (1,600sq.m) plot of land within the Phoenix Gold Golf Course, which is between Bang Saray and Ban Amphur. From here it is just a few minutes from Ocean Marina, Khao Chee Chan Image (Buddha Mountain), Silverlake Vineyard, Nong Nooch tropical gardens. For golf lovers there are also another 18 top class golf courses within 30 minutes from the villa. Pattaya City is close enough to provide evening options with its many shopping and entertainment venues and now with mobile taxi apps it is really easy to get anywhere! Also, there is a choice of stunning tropical beaches, 2 water-parks (Ramayana and Amazone Cartoon Network) close by. getting to and from the property is also very easy with the new direct Bangkok to Pattaya motorway which exits just a few kms away, plus the local U-Tapao airprt with lots of domestic flights, and the current upgrades to make it Thailand's 3rd largest airport in just a few years time. Because of its multipurpose design this beautiful and unique property can be enjoyed as a luxury private home, with lots of space reserved for family & friends, or it could be purchased for use a holiday rental villa, or even a resort. Its 6 individual high quality furnished Villas and a separate large Club House with bar, fully equipped European kitchen and entertainment area are built around a large split level pool that includes custom features, such as lights, bridges and a waterfall. The pool is walled on 3 sides, the fourth side opening onto a lake. Additionally, there is an extensive 3 level roof terrace with a bar, a BBQ and multiple seating and entertainment areas, which can hold up to 150 people. It provides panoramic views of the surrounding golf course, countryside and lake. Each of the five 47 sq.m. villas are self-contained individually decorated living unit and comes with a kitchen and an en-suite bathroom. The larger 72 sq.m. villa features an en suite-bathroom and larger kitchen as well as sleeping arrangements for up to 5 people. A newly constructed self contained staff accommodation unit has full facilities for operating and maintaining the property. Off road and undercover parking is also available on the property. Originally built in 2009, the property has just been completely renovated and upgraded to the highest standards and is ready for immediate use. Unique multipurpose Property on Phoenix Gold Golf Club Pattaya Estate for Sale Total land size: 1.600 sq.m. Property size: 800 sq.m. 5 individual villas 47 sq.m. 1 individual villa 72 sq.m. 6 bedrooms, 6 bathrooms, 1 toilet 1 Club House with fully equipped European kitchen, TV-lounge and bar 3 level rooftop terrace with bar Split level pool with waterfall

titles.title: City Garden Pattaya

descriptions.description: City Garden is a well-known condominium building located between 2 nd Road and Soi Buakhao. This is the perfect spot to live with the beach, the restaurants, bars and shops so close by. It isalso a quiet location where you don’t get annoyed by the noise from the bars. The complex has plenty of parking a gym and a good sized swimming pool. The apartment is on the second floor and like all City Garden apartments is built with comfort in mind. 46m² is plenty of space for one or two people to spread out in. The apartment is fullyfurnished with quality furnishings and available for rent on a long term basis. Call Cornerstone Real Estate on +66 384 11250 or Email info@cornerstone.co.th for further details, or to make an appointment.

titles.title: Siam Place

descriptions.description: Siam Place. This village with 24 hour security is located along Siam Country Club Road in East Pattaya. It is just a few minutes away from a huge 7 day market, a choice of banks, convenience stores and other local shops. This residential area is popular with families as it is much quieter that the bustling city, and it offers convenience for getting to schools, family activities and working Expats needing to reach places within the Eastern Seaboard. This 3 bedroom property has a 280 sq.m plot with a nice sized garden (perfect for the kids) and is available to rent fully furnished. Siam Place provides residents with use of the communal swimming pool, plus there are friendly security guards day & night. It is available for rent on a long term 12 month basis with a 2 month security deposit. Call us on 038411250 or email info@old.cornerstone.co.th to make an appointment

titles.title: View Talay Villas

descriptions.description: View Talay Villas. This established high end village is situated in Jomtien and is in walking distance to Jomtien beach and all local amenities such as: markets, shops, restaurants & bars, and is on the public transport (Baht Bus) routes. This good quality single storey private pool villa sits on a 240sq.m plot which is large enough to entertain plenty of family and friends outside easily. Inside, the home comes with nice built-in furniture and clean decorations. Another great feature is the practical built-in European kitchen which is next to open plan lounge and dining areas. There are 2 full sized bedrooms, with the master bedroom positioned so that it can see (and walk out into) the gardens, and private pool area. There is a furnished outdoor terrace by the private swimming pool as well. View Talay Villas has a lovely atmosphere with landscaped roads, plus a huge club house & communal swimming pool. It is available for rent on a long term 12 month basis with a 2 month security deposit. Call us on 038411250 or email info@old.cornerstone.co.th to make an appointment

titles.title: The Residence Jomtien Beach

descriptions.description: The Residence Jomtien. A low rise condo with massive communal pool, and poolside gymnasium. Located in Jomtien it is possible to reach the beach within 5 minutes and is close to Rumpho market and the Baht Bus taxi routes. This property really does feel big with its 51 sq.m layout and that the views out from the balcony giving an infinite view. From the 4th floor balcony you look down over the communal pool. All of the decoration and furnishings are nice and of very good quality. It boasts a European kitchen, large living space, bathroom and air conditioning throughout. For Sale in Thai Name Ownership with 50/50 split taxes and transfer fees. For Rent on a long term basis only, with a 2 month security deposit. Call us on +6638411250 or Email info@old.cornerstone.co.th to make an appointment

titles.title: Tudor Court

descriptions.description: Tudor Court is tucked down Pratumnak Soi 3 which is a dead end road. There is very limited traffic so it is a lovely quiet spot. But it is easy access to Jomtien and Pattaya, to Cosy Beach and to local restaurants and bars. The beach is clean and uncrowded here also. The studio is 38m² and positioned on the 3rd floor. It is fully furnished and has a real airy feel to it. There is a balcony and a wet room. The condo has a large swimming pool and covered parking. Call Cornerstone Real Estate on +66 384 11250 or Email info@old.cornerstone.co.th for further details or to make an appointment.

titles.title: Pattaya Hill 2

descriptions.description: Pattaya Hill 2 village is a high end secured community in the popular area of Khao Noi in East Pattaya. The village has nice wide internal roads leading to properties on larger than average land plots. Also, onsite there is a lovely communal swimming pool with ample shaded seating and has some of the best 24hr patrolling security. The main house offers a 3 bedroom, and 2 bathrooms. The master bedroom has an en-suite bathroom, a bathtub, and walk in shower, Then the 2nd bedroom and the guest bedroom which share a bathroom. There is also a 60 sqm external building that can be used as a guest house with toilet Reduced originally from 6.7 Million and can be sold at 4.95 Million Thai Baht The property will be sold fully furnished with only a few peronal belongings to be taken out. descriptions.description: This is one of the older buildings in Jomtien and as such is built on a grander style than the newcomers. It is just 250m from the lovely Jomtien beach. It has a swimming pool, sauna and gym, and ample parking. It is located close to Soi Chaiyaphruek so a restaurant and a beer aren’t far away at all. The studio unit is 40m² and located on the 7th floor. The balcony is a good size to appreciate the sea breeze. There are built in wardrobes and plenty of storage space. Fully furnished with a small kitchen area, it’s a great spot to get away and relax. titles.title: Maxx Central

descriptions.description: Maxx Central Condominium. If you are looking for a city centre location that offers a quieter surrounding to Pattaya 2nd road, or Soi Buakow, then Maxx Central Condo shouldn’t be overlooked. The building is low-rise and it is located off Pattaya 3rd Road, close to Central Pattaya Road. From here it is possible to walk to Big C Extra, Soi Buakow and with public transport be spoilt with a choice of high street shopping malls, and entertainment venues like Walking street and North Pattaya. The property is positioned on the 4th floor of the building, and the owner has always maintained and made improvements to the condo when needed. It is a corner unit of 78 sq.m. The living area is very usable and the design offers a wrap around balcony with 180° views of the city. There is a washing machine, work surface and a BBQ area out here on the balcony. Inside the well lit apartment, there is a modern European kitchen, full furniture and full air conditioning. The bedroom also has access to the balcony and built in wardrobes. The communal features of the condo include: a communal pool and garden, fitness center, underground parking, on-site maintenance and maids team and even a club-style lounge-bar on the ground floor. This property is owned in Foreign Name Ownership, with all tax and transfer fees split 50/50 between seller and buyer

titles.title: Laguna Bay 2

descriptions.description: Laguna Bay 2 is located in the Pratumnak area which has always been very popular with expats. On the hill between Pattaya and Jomtien it benefits from both plus it also has its own community of quieter bars and restaurants. The beach is less crowded here and there are relaxing walks along the promenade to be had. Access into town is easy in a car/motorbike, and there are plenty of taxis and Songtows in the area. Laguna Bay 2 has a communal pool, sauna and gym. This unit is 37m² and located on the 5th floor overlooking the pool with some sea views. The property is fully furnished including a European style kitchen. There is even space for a dining area, or enjoy your food on the balcony. Available for long term rental with a 2 month security deposit. Call Cornerstone Real Estate on +66 384 11250 or Email info@old.cornerstone.co.th for further details or to make an appointment.

titles.title: City Garden Pratumnak

descriptions.description: City Garden Pratumnak. Located on the top of Cozy Beach this 8 storey condominium comprises of 2 buildings which run either side of the central communal swimming pool. Below each building is underground car parking, and there is a reception desk and fitness center on the ground floor of one of the buildings. Cozy Beach is a quiet hillside between Pattaya and Jomtien with a great beach and small high street. There is always regular access to public transport to get into Pattaya and Jomtien. From the building it is just a short walk to choice of restaurants, shops and services and within easy walking distance to the popular Cosy Beach. This 5th floor unit comes fully furnished, and has a Euro kitchen, air conditioning throughout, and full height windows and balcony sliding doors.It is available to buy in Foreign Name (freehold) ownership with any property taxes and transfer fees split on a 50/50 basis.

titles.title: Laguna Beach Resort 3 - The Maldives

descriptions.description: Laguna Beach Resort "Maldives" is the 3rd condominium to carry the "Laguna Beach" brand name. This is the developers largest to date with an incredible central lagoon swimming pool which has many secluded outdoor spaces within a tropical landscape besides the masses of water. The gymnasium also looks directly out across the swimming pool. Located close to Jomtien Beach, this low rise (8 storey) resort provides easy access to all of the shops, restaurants and attractions along Jomtien Beach road, and Jomtien 2nd road. It is possible to find everything you need for day-to-day living, and it is a more slow paced and laid back environment than the bustle of Pattaya City. This 3rd floor studio has great swimming pool views from its balcony. Inside, the whole unit has modern fitted and built in furniture, plus a Euro kitchenette, Air Conditioning and rain shower bathroom. The unit is offered for rent with a minimum 6 month rental contract, plus the property is for sale in Thai Name Ownership. The taxes and transfer fees to change name shall be split equally 50/50 Call us on +6638411250 or Email info@old.cornerstone.co.th

titles.title: City Garden Pratumnak

descriptions.description: City Garden Pratumnak. This modern low-rise condominium was completed in 2016 and stands on the top of Cozy Beach - Pratumnak Hill. There are 2 residential buildings which run either side of the central communal swimming pool. Below each building is underground car parking, and there is a reception desk and fitness center on the ground floor of one of the buildings. City Garden Pratumnak is a quiet beach area between Pattaya and Jomtien. It is just a short walk to choice of restaurants, shops and services and within easy walking distance to the popular Cosy Beach. There is easy access to public transportation for trips to Pattaya and Jomtien. This 5th floor unit comes fully furnished, and has a Euro kitchen, air conditioning throughout, and full height windows and balcony sliding doors. It is available to buy in Foreign Name (freehold) ownership with any property taxes and transfer fees split on a 50/50 basis. It is available for rent on a long term 12 month basis with a 2 month security deposit. Call us on 038411250 or email info@old.cornerstone.co.th to make an appointment

descriptions.description: The Avenue Condo is a well-known condominium complex in the heart of the city. It’s nestled between Soi Buakhao and 2nd Road, approx. 400 metres from the beach. The Avenue shopping mall is close by with the cinema on the top floor. Everything is on your doorstep here with restaurants, bars, coffee shops and all manner of shops within walking distance. Central Plaza is less than a kilometer away by foot or the regular Songtows that frequent 2nd Road. The complex has underground parking, gym, sauna and swimming pool. There is a range of studio, one and 2 bed apartments available. This apartment is 44m² and has a separate bedroom. On the 7th floor it has city views from the balcony. The property comes fully furnished including a European kitchen and a great shower room. titles.title: The Axis

descriptions.description: The Axis Condo. This high rise tower sits right at the top of Pratumnak Hill. This gives almost all of the units good views over the hillside, and many with sea views of Pattaya City, Jomtien or Pratumnak beaches. This 8th floor unit has been furnished to a high taste and does have some excellent views over the recreation parks and Buddha Hill. In total the property is 38sq.m and comes complete with fitted kitchen, built in washing machine, built in wardrobes and wall mounted slimline LED TV. The Axis has an amazing sea & city view infinity swimming pool, a large air conditioned gymnasium and multi storey car park. titles.title: The Cliff

descriptions.description: The Cliff Condominium is located on Cozy Beach, Pratumnak Hill. Cozy Beach is a gorgeous small sandy bay, with clean waters and views across to Koh Larn Island. Pratumnak Hill is the area that separates Jomtien Beach and Pattaya City. It has 3 very nice beaches of its own, and the Cozy Beach part of the hillside has its own small high street that offers residents some great restaurants in the immediate area, many different spa treatments, plus the usual convenience stores, an area for fresh fruit market stalls, and in the evening there are a good selection of restaurants & bars to choose from. It is possible to get public transport here as well. This 26th floor one bedroom apartment is very practically laid out and the views from the balcony are amazing. The property comes fully equipped with a Euro kitchen, fitted bathroom and full furniture, plus from this 10th floor balcony you can see down to the swimming pool below. As well as the communal swimming pool there are children’s water slides and a poolside gymnasium. The condo is available to rent with a minimum 6 month contract and a 2 month security deposit. Contact Cornerstone Real Estate via Email: info@old.cornerstone.co.th or call the office on +6638411250 for further details, or to make an appointment.

titles.title: 2 bedroom Condo in CC Condominium 2 East Pattaya

descriptions.description: This Condo – reference number CR065 is located in East Pattaya which is part of the Bang Lamung district in Chonburi . titles.title: The Cliff

descriptions.description: The Cliff condominium. This large one bedroom unit comes fully equipped with a large fitted Euro kitchen, spacious separate living room and bedroom and a bathroom with bath tub. Throughout the unit are good quality built-in and loose furnishings and air conditioning. The Cliff condominium provides all residents access to use the huge communal swimming pool, children’s water slides and a poolside gymnasium. There is also a children's playground, underground parking and on-site reception, security and maintenance staff. Located on Pratumnak Hill, this area has its own small high street that has plenty to offer. There is a choice of massage and spa’s, souvenir shops, convenience stores and some market stalls, and a good selection of restaurants & bars to unwind at the end of the day. Pratumnak Hill is just a few minutes drive from Downtown Pattaya and is a much more quiet and relaxed part of the city. Available to rent with a 12 month contact and a 2 month security deposit. Contact Cornerstone Real Estate via Email: info@old.cornerstone.co.th or call the office on +6638411250 for further details, or to make an appointment

titles.title: Mabprachan Pool Villa

descriptions.description: This single storey villa is located in a very popular area of East Pattaya, very close to the Mabprachan lake. This place offers easy access onto the highways and motorways which feed all of the Ex Pat Eastern Seaboard industry areas, plus a whole host of International schools, and golf courses! This area really has become 'the' Ex Pat area for families. With plenty of child, and family activities ranging from horse riding, sports and leisure, cycle tracks, ATV's, football pitches and much much more Set in a small enclave of private houses, this 3 bedroom villa really does offer something wonderful. Upon entering through the electric gates you are greeted by a massive private swimming pool and poolside covered terrace. This is perfect for the tropical climate and must be a delight to own and enjoy. Inside the home the living room extends onto this spacious terrace from 2 sides. This living space has an open plan Euro kitchen next to a separate pantry, guest bathroom, dining area and TV/living area. The master bedroom and guest bedrooms all have patio doors that lead out to the garden and pool area as well. Each bedroom has private en-suite bathrooms and the whole house comes fully furnished. Other additions are the outdoor kitchen, laundry area, covered carport and even an outdoor sauna. Please call us to arrange a viewing of this fantastic property. +6638411250 or Email info@old.cornerstone.co.th

titles.title: The Cliff

descriptions.description: The Cliff Condominium is located on Cozy Beach, Pratumnak Hill. This area is just a few minutes drive from Downtown Pattaya and is a much more quiet and relaxed part of the city. Boasting its own small high street that has plenty to offer. By day you can enjoy a choice of massage and spa's, and in the evening there are a good selection of restaurants & bars to unwind. Cozy Beach is a gorgeous small sandy bay, with clean waters and views across to Koh Larn Island. This 10th floor studio apartment is very spacious and a well laid out use of space. The property comes fully equipped with a Euro kitchen, fitted bathroom and full furniture, plus from this 10th floor balcony you can see down to the swimming pool below. As well as the communal swimming pool there are children's water slides and a poolside gymnasium. The condo is available to rent with a minimum 6 month contract and a 2 month security deposit

titles.title: The Cliff

descriptions.description: The Cliff Condominium. This is a 27 floor high rise tower located in the Cozy Beach area of Pratumnak Hill. The building offers some amazing communal facilities for all of its residents which include a huge swimming pool with a children area and water slides, as well as a poolside gymnasium. Along all sides of the pool is sufficient sunbed areas as well. Also in the list of features you will see a children's playground, underground car-parking, 24 hour security and an onsite reception & maintenance team. Set on the 3rd floor of the building, this 37 Sq.m studio unit has been well decorated and furnished throughout. There is a nice fitted Western kitchen with upper and lower storage, a full height built in wardrobe and a marble bathroom. Call Cornerstone Real Estate on +6638411250 or Email info@old.cornerstone.co.th for further details, or to make an appointment

titles.title: Ananya Wongamat

descriptions.description: Ananya Beachfront Condo is found directly on a stunning beachfront position along Wongamat Beach. This is Pattaya's Northern beach and it has some of the beast views around. There is an outlook right out to sea, with the smaller Koh Larn island on the horizon, plus the crescent bay rolls back to Pattaya City so you can see the whole skyline clearly. The building offers direct beach access, and an 80 metre infinity pool which runs between the beach and the 2 buildings. This 42 Sq.m studio is located on the 2nd floor and is a corner unit. This mean that it gets additional windows which help brighten the property and make it feel more spacious. The white high gloss fitted furniture and Western kitchen also look amazing. Any buyer will appreciate that the property is sold fully furnished as each item is good quality and compliments the room well. The title deed is held in Foreign Name ownership, and all taxes & transfer fees will be split 50/50 between buyer and seller Send us an Email or contact the office for more details, or to arrange a viewing Tel: +6638411250 Email: info@cornerstone.co.th

titles.title: Centara Avenue Residence and Suites

descriptions.description: Centara Avenue Residence is a low-rise condominium set just of Pattaya 2nd Road in the centre of the city. It is possible to walk to every location from here. 3 shopping malls are right on the doorstep, and there is a busy road that has tons of bars & restaurants around a 2 minute walk away. Of course, Pattaya beach is also 400 metres from here. The condominium has a huge central lagoon swimming pool with a sunken bar, and children's water slides. Part of this project includes Centara azure Hotel which has an on-site restaurant which all residents can enjoy too. This studio unit is located on the 8th floor of the building and is 35 sq.m in total size. Available for rent long term with a 2 month security deposit Call us +6638411250 or Email info@cornerstone.co.th for more details and to arrange a viewing

titles.title: Bang Saray Modern Pool Villa

descriptions.description: This ultra modern 4 bedroom house, boasts a huge living area of around 450 sqm and house sits on 800 sqm of land, large private pool and car port area and set in a very quiet part of Bang Saray, the beach being less than 5 minutes away. The house has a self contained guest suite, that is finished in stunning brushed wall effect and outside shower. The comes fully furnished to a high standard and is owned in Thai name, which can easily be transferred into a company if required. Please contact the team at Cornerstone Real Estate for more information on this premium property.

The surrounding area is quiet and peaceful and there is a beachfront communal swimming pool available for all residents. Na Jomtien has some of the best beachfront restaurants in the whole of the city, plus you can get into Pattaya City within 20-25 minutes. titles.title: House in AD House East Pattaya H002540

descriptions.description: AD House. This small village of private pool villas is located in the Khao Talo area of East Pattaya. All amenities are close by, and their are lots of fantastic European Restaurants within minutes of here. The 3 bedroom single storey villa has all rooms wrapping around the private swimming pool and outdoor terrace. Inside the house is kitted out with modern appliances and fitting. The western kitchen has a built in oven & dishwasher and there is also a washing machine provided. The rental price includes, True fiber optic internet, TMN cable TV, once a month pest control spraying and gardening, three times per week pool service and all community fees. Owned within a Thai company set-up the transfer costs are quite low. Contact Cornerstone Real Estate: Email: info@cornerstone.co.th or call +6638411250 for further details.
